long_description: The Coleman Classic Rechargeable lantern lets you have fun long after the sun goes down. And it accepts a rechargeable battery pack so you don't need to keep buying batteries. Cree XP-E Emitter LED sits at the bottom of the globe and shines up through a translucent center tube for uniform light dispersion and a nice soft glow; outputs 190 lumens. Lantern can be powered by a rechargeable Coleman CPX 6 battery pack or 4 D batteries (CPX 6 battery pack included; D batteries sold separately). Rechargeable battery pack has a dual color-changing LED that displays when the battery is charging (red) and when it is fully charged (green). CPX 6 battery pack eliminates the need to continually buy disposable batteries. D batteries provide 122 hrs. of runtime; CPX 6 battery pack provides 12 hrs. The Coleman Classic Rechargeable lantern includes a 120V AC/DC adapter and a 12V DC adapter to charge the battery pack. Carry handle has a chrome-plated finish.
short_description: The Coleman Classic Rechargeable lantern lets you have fun long after the sun goes down. And it accepts a rechargeable battery pack so you don't need to keep buying batteries.
